# Draft:Unity Democracy Dignity Union Cobas

----
The Unity Democracy Dignity Union Cobas (Italian: Sindacato Unione Democrazia Dignit√† Cobas), SUDD Cobas, is an independent union in Prato and Florence, Italy. The union is known for its use of permanent picket lines in front of factory gates.
History
In 2018, immigrant workers in Prato and Florence began organizing with the labour union [https://sicobas.org/tag/grucce/ Si Cobas].
In January 2021, the union began a nine-month strike at the fabric printing company Texprint Srl for workers' right to a 40-hour workweek ("8x5"). This strike marked the beginning of what union leaders call the "8x5 movement."
In May 2024, the local split from SI Cobas and founded [https://suddcobas.it/blog/en/ SUDD Cobas].
In April 2025, SUDD Cobas successfully launched a series of simultaneous, unlimited strikes at various textile and garment companies.
